thread.title: Korn's Jonathan Davis Is Making a Country Album — Really
thread.title_full: Korn's Jonathan Davis Is Making a Country Album — Really | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Korn's Jonathan Davis Is Making a Country Album — Really
text:
Korn's Jonathan Davis. Photo by Aaron Thackeray Denver blog posts are a multi-genre affair.
Related Stories Iron Maiden Is Terrible and Other Claims About Six Worst "Essential" Metal Albums Our Music blog features a wide-ranging interview with Korn's Jonathan Davis , who reveals that he's making a country album — as well as exploring a collab with Marilyn Manson.
A memorable BigMedia.org headline: " Colorado GOP Loses a Thorn in Its Ass ."
Predominantly Orange's Sayre Bedinger says history points to the Broncos returning to the Super Bowl . Your mouth to God's ear.
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
